alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 07 at 9:32PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The Taiya River near Areas Along Low Lying Portions Of The Chilkoot Trail. * WHEN...Until 600 AM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 931 PM AKDT, satellite estimates and rain gauge data indicate heavy rain across the advisory area. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly, especially near the Taiya River. Between 0.25 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inches are possible. - For Taiya River near Skagway: At 9:00pm the stage was 17.1 feet. Flood Stage is 16.5 feet. Forecast: A crest around 17 feet is expected Saturday evening.
info.instruction: Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information.
